typeProperties.script:

	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	entity: 'dir',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	manifestName: 'Geolife Trajectories 1.3.zip',
	corpusPath: '',
	corpusStore: 'adlsgen2',
	adlsgen2_fileSystem: 'geolife',
	folderPath: '',
	fileSystem: 'geolife') ~> source1
